alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Westmoreland (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 8:40PM EDT until August 12 at 9:15PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN WESTMORELAND AND NORTHEASTERN FAYETTE COUNTIES... At 840 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Mount Pleasant, or 10 miles south of Greensburg, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. Locations impacted include... Mount Pleasant, Scottdale, Seven Springs, Calumet-Norvelt, Everson, Donegal, Champion, Indian Head, Acme, Jones Mills, Laurel Mountain State Park, and Normalville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
